results.title: Evolution of transcriptomic profiles in relapsed inv(16) acute myeloid leukemia.
results.text_hl: To enhance @CHEMICAL_venetoclax @CHEMICAL_MESH:C579720 @@@Venetoclax@@@ efficacy, we tested in vitro effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ as a potential drug able to enhance chemosensitivity of @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015470 @@@AML@@@ cells by inhibiting the mitochondrial transfer.

results.title: GFI1B acts as a metabolic regulator in hematopoiesis and acute myeloid leukemia
results.text_hl: Finally, we showed that @GENE_GFI1B @GENE_8328 @@@Gfi1b@@@-deficient @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015470 @@@AML@@@ cells were more sensitive to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as well as drugs implicated in OXPHOS and FAO inhibition, opening new potential therapeutic strategies.
